price: 46. Waxaa ka mid ah Calaamooyinka (Alle  ee muujinaya Weynidiisa) inuu soo diro dabeylaha iyagoo ku bishaareyn (roob) iyo inuu idin dhadhansiiyo wax ka mid ah Naxariistiisa iyo in doomuhu ku socdaan Amarkiisa oo aad dalabtaan Deeqdiisa, markaas aad Alle ku mahdisaan.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦٓ أَن يُرۡسِلَ ٱلرِّيَاحَ مُبَشِّرَٰتٖ وَلِيُذِيقَكُم مِّن رَّحۡمَتِهِۦ وَلِتَجۡرِيَ ٱلۡفُلۡكُ بِأَمۡرِهِۦ وَلِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦ وَلَعَلَّكُمۡ تَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamin āyātihi an yur'sila al-riyāḥa mubashirātin waliyudhīqakum min raḥmatihi walitajriya al-ful'ku bi-amrihi walitabtaghū min faḍlihi walaʿallakum tashkurūna
